history.content: <md>Email math department with math declaration form and double major form. After successfully declare math and have math advisor sign double major form, submit CS application online with double major form uploaded. After have CS advisor sign double major form, submit it to L&S advisor (When I declared, I submitted double major form to 206 Evans).</md>

Hi I am an intended CS+ Applied Math major. I am taking last prerequisites for both majors( Math 55 and CS 61B). I am planning to declare major in Applied Math first(during the semester) and then CS(after the grades come out) . 

In this case, should I submit single major declaration form when I declare major in Math, and the double major declaration form when I declare major in CS? 

I am somewhat confused about the major declaration procedure, so I would be grateful if someones give me some clarification.

Thank you very much!
history.subject: Double major declaration
